title: How to find your GCSB public profile URL
content: Learn how to locate and share your Google Cloud Skills Boost public profile URL to track your progress and achievements.

title: How to redeem credit
content: Step-by-step guide on redeeming Google Cloud credits for hands-on labs and practical exercises.

title: Understanding badge completion requirements
